Glad to hear about there being some new faces here. I'm gunna go check out the wiiki right now and the info that is there.

Nic <warriorazure@...> wrote:                                  Hey Rick! It's great to see you again! Just to correct Kraftlos, the
 crazy bot is actually in Pentatron. I'm initiating two newbies (namely
 my girlfriend and my brother) so don't worry if there's some context
 stuff they get earlier. So, there's a lot of new people and a lot of
 action starting.
 
 --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Kraftlos <kraftlos@...> wrote:
 >
 > OOC: Welcome back.  I currently have Rodimus, I'll continue posting
 for him
 > until you want him back.  We've started a Wiki project
 > http://wikihost.org/wikis/nbwrpg_wiki/
 > 
 > Currently, a prison ship is struggling to maintain orbit, Hydras has
 sent
 > Dinobot 2 to attack the Pasifcus base in Atlantis (and I was planning on
 > having Rodimus help defend the city).   Some crazy bot is on the
 loose in
 > Relay and is eating sparks.  And the Iron Skulls predecons are planning
 > something evil...
 > 
 > On 2/27/07, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
 > >
 > >   Well recently I was contacted on my myspace about coming back to
 NBW and
 > > I think it's time I did.
 > >
 > > I'm going to need a massive update on events. When I'm caught up I'll
 > > reclaim Rodimus. I think I'll stick with one char for now though.
 > >
 > > Hope to hear from you all soon.
 > >
 > > ~Robo
 > >
 > > ------------------------------
 > > TV dinner still cooling?
 > > Check out "Tonight's
 Picks"<http://us.rd.yahoo.com/evt=49979/*http://tv.yahoo.com/>on
 Yahoo! TV.
 > >
 > >  
 > >
 >
 
 
     
                       

 
---------------------------------
Don't pick lemons.
See all the new 2007 cars at Yahoo! Autos.
